links.title: Pacific summit ends with no communique as China, US differ
links.description: PORT MORESBY, Papua New Guinea (AP) - An acrimonious meeting of world leaders in Papua New Guinea failed to agree Sunday on a final communique, highlighting widening divisions between global powers China and the U.S. The 21 nations at the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation summit in Port Moresby struggled to bridge differences on the role of the World Trade Organization, which governs international trade, officials said.

messages.body: $CAT $SPY $QQQ $AAPL $AMZN trade deal weakens https://www.marketbeat.com/articles/pence-xi-trade-barbs-in-speeches-at-pacific-summit-2018-11-17/

links.title: Pacific Rim summit highlights strained China-US relations
links.description: PORT MORESBY, Papua New Guinea (AP) - A meeting of world leaders in Papua New Guinea has highlighted widening divisions between global powers the U.S. and China and a growing competition for influence in the usually neglected South Pacific.

links.title: Market Brothers Media
links.description: Who We Are Market Brothers Media is a group of people passionate about investing and the financial markets. At MBM we don't take ourselves to seriously. Unlike most of the financial media, we try to cover the business and investing world by encompassing humor and satire into our analysis, hopefully making it more enjoyable for the reader or listener.

Weighing The Week Ahead: Will Holiday Shopping Provide An Economic Boost? $DDS $M $SJM $TCEHY $AAPL $NVDA $LEN $PHM https://t.co/tdEfTgAigh

links.title: Weighing The Week Ahead: Will Holiday Shopping Provide An Economic Boost?
links.description: We have a normal economic calendar, but a very short week. Many market participants will head for home early on Wednesday for an extended weekend. Some will skip this week entirely. We'll have interesting data on housing, sentiment, and leading indicators, all reported in a three-day period. The prediction for Friday is easy.
